content.text:
# Analysis of the Main Target Image

The main target image shows two separate structures composed of green and orange building blocks:

## Structure 1 (Left side):
- This is a vertical tower-like structure with 3 layers
- Bottom layer: A horizontal green rectangular block (base)
- Middle layer: An orange cylindrical block standing vertically
- Top layer: A complex green arrangement with two vertical rectangular blocks on top of a horizontal green block

## Structure 2 (Right side):
- This is a more complex structure resembling a small house or gate
- It has orange cylindrical pillars in the middle (2 vertical cylinders)
- Green rectangular blocks on both sides of the pillars (acting as walls)
- Orange triangular/wedge blocks forming a roof and extending outward on the sides

## Selection of Required Blocks from Dictionary

For Structure 1 (Left tower):
- Bottom: Green horizontal rectangular block (index 2)
- Middle: Orange vertical cylindrical block (index 7)
- Top: Green horizontal rectangular block (index 2) with two green vertical rectangular blocks on top (indices 3 and 4)

For Structure 2 (Right structure):
- Middle pillars: Two orange vertical cylindrical blocks (index 7 Ã— 2)
- Side walls: Three green vertical rectangular blocks (indices 3, 4, and 5)
- Roof and extensions: Four orange triangular/wedge blocks (indices 11, 12, 14, and 15)

## Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 2  # Base of left structure
    Step2: Move block with index 7  # Vertical orange cylinder on left structure
    Step3: Move block with index 2  # Horizontal green block for top of left structure
    Step4: Move block with index 3  # Left vertical green block on top of left structure
    Step5: Move block with index 4  # Right vertical green block on top of left structure
    Step6: Move block with index 7  # Left orange cylinder for right structure
    Step7: Move block with index 7  # Right orange cylinder for right structure
    Step8: Move block with index 3  # Left green vertical block for right structure
    Step9: Move block with index 5  # Middle green vertical block for right structure
    Step10: Move block with index 4  # Right green vertical block for right structure
    Step11: Move block with index 11  # Left roof triangular block
    Step12: Move block with index 12  # Right roof triangular block
    Step13: Move block with index 14  # Left extension triangular block
    Step14: Move block with index 15  # Right extension triangular block
}
```
